import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup-start', templateUrl: './signup-start.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup-start.component.scss'], standalone: true, }) export class SignupStartComponent implements OnInit { loginForm: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]), password: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(7)]), }) constructor() { } ngOnInit() {} }
